title: textbox height has no effect when sets value below 30
body:
### Describe the bug

when i tried to changed the textbox's height to a value less than 30, i didn't see any changes.
but if i sets it to a bigger value , the  height of textbox changed.

### To Reproduce

	<TextBox Height="20" FontSize="12" Width="199"></TextBox>

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Avalonia version

11.0.10

### OS

Windows

### Additional context

_No response_
